description: Takitsubo Rikou is a member of ITEM. Her ability is called AIM Stalker (能力追跡, Nouryoku Tsuiseki) which she uses to track down espers by memorizing their AIM fields. Her ability also allows her to steal other espers` abilities by memorizing their AIM, potentially allowing her to become the eighth Level 5 esper in Academy City.
name: Takitsubo Rikou
